parameters: \nd<Damian>I'm so bored, just watching the wall
\nd<Damian>So what is it? Just say it,
you don't have to be so reluctant to me.
\nd<Marcus>Do you want to tag along with me to
get some herbs in the forest?
\nd<Damian>Sure, why not?! I've got nothing to
\nd<Damian>Hold on, I need to get my stuff first.
A very historical picture from the past.
A very historical picture from the past.
Do you want to read the tutorial again?
In menu tab, there's few commands that you can select
SKILL | You can learn skills from this command
INVENTORY | You can see all the items you have and use them
EQUIP | You can equip all the equipments you have in this command
JOB | You can change class of the members anytime you want
PARTY | You can change the formation from your party
STATUS | You can check the status from your member with this command
ALLOCATE | You can add stats from AP you get when reach new level
GRID STRATEGY | You can manage formation of the party when battling
OPTIONS | You can manipulate settings from this command
TO TITLE | Select this if you want to return to title screen
\nd<Tips>You can save your progress with the \c[11]Green Crystal\c[0].
By default, Arrow Button on keyboard for movement, Enter Button
to do action, Escape Button to open menu and Back action, and
You can see the tutorial again with the book in bookshelf
